Texto: 
the patient states that he is in excellent health.  no labs were obtained.
none.
plain film radiograph demonstrates a right sided aortic arch.  ct of the chest with intravenous contrast demonstrates a right sided aortic arch with aberrant left subclavian artery.
right aortic arch with aberrant left subclavian artery
-right aortic arch with aberrant left subclavian artery.
-right aortic arch with mirror image brachiocephalic arteries.
21 year old caucasian male who was found to have a right aortic arch on frontal radiograph obtained for a routine physical exam.  the patient denies any symptoms.
